1.title: Omaha

episode of.title: Steak Out with Kix Brooks (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: In the premiere episode, Kix takes a trip to Omaha, Nebraska, to see how three local legends have made a name for themselves. Included: juicy prime rib at the family-owned "Johnny's Café"; traditional European fare at "Davio's"'; and Gorat's whiskey rib eye.

2.title: Dallas

episode of.title: Steak Out with Kix Brooks (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Kix visits the Lone Star State. Among the highlights: Hill Country cuisine, including chicken-fried lobster, at YO Steakhouse in Dallas; cowboy cooking at Cattlemen's in Fort Worth; and the innovative and modern techniques of Knife.

3.title: Denver

episode of.title: Steak Out with Kix Brooks (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: A trip to Denver takes Kix to "Bastien's" for their sugar steak. Also: he learns why the "Buckhorn Exchange" is famous for their pot roast; and he checks out "Guard and Grace's" steak flight.

4.title: New Orleans

episode of.title: Steak Out with Kix Brooks (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Kix dines at three New Orleans restaurants, during his visit to his home state of Louisiana. Included: Galatoire's fried chicken; sizzling hot steaks served in butter; and Cajun and Creole flavors on the menu at Dickie Brennan's Steakhouse.

5.title: Washington, D.C.

episode of.title: Steak Out with Kix Brooks (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Kix visits Washington, D.C., where he learns more about the food served at local fave, "Ray's the Steaks"; the "Partisan", which has its own in-house butcher shop; and the South American restaurant, "Del Campo".

6.title: New York City

episode of.title: Steak Out with Kix Brooks (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: In the Season 1 finale, Kix explores New York City's best steakhouses. Included: the mutton chop at "Keens"; a Jewish restaurant known for its stuffed cabbage; and a converted auto shop that serves a "bone-in" burger and pork chops that are thinly sliced and piled high like a stack of pancakes.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Steak Out with Kix Brooks (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot:

akas: Steak Out with Kix Brooks (United States)
plot: Country music star 'Kix Brooks' (qv) tours U.S. steak restaurants as inspiration for creating his own.::anonymous
